resources.string: New version available, get it now?

To move on the map, swipe in the direction you need.
	You can enter stores or schools.
	Rest of the schools will be available as soon as you beat 4 levels at the current school.
	If you escape the battle, then you can't enter either another school or store.

You need some gold in order to purchase item.
	There are two kind of stores. 

1) Drug store, where you can purchase:
1. bandage - restores 30 hit points.
2. pill - restores 1 mana.
3. roller-bandage - fully restores your hit points.
4. potion - doubles your damage by 2 till the end of the round.

2) Item store, where you can purchase: 
1. boot - your next attack makes enemy drowsy. (Enemy can not shoot)
2. boulder - your next attack deals doubled damage. 
3. ice shard - your next attack freezes enemy. 
4. icicle - your next attack deals double damage and freezes enemy.

You can control your character by pressing on the left, right or center part of the screen. Pressing on the left or on the right will make character move left or right. By pressing center, character will start to gain power. By pressing center again character will throw snowball. (Distance depends on the power)
	You can open backpack to use purchased items or to use your special ability. It'll also pause the game.
	In order to open backpack, just click on the top UI-bar. To use item, just click this item. To use special ability click bottom part of the backpack. 
	 Special ability depends on your mana: 
If you have 1 mana, ability will damage all your opponents, and make them drowsy. 
If you have 2, ability will damage and freeze all of your opponents. 
If you have 3, ability will deal double damage, and freeze all opponents.
	When you complete the level, you will acquire some gold. 
	Round ends when there is no opponents left. Do not let them down you!
	If you escape the battle, then your hp will not recover when you enter this stage again.
